title: Personalized Learning Design Strategies for Improving Private Education Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Private education experience and understanding of fundamental educational assessment principles
context.additional_context: Assessment system centered on digital device utilization and comprehensive evaluation

learning_goals: Learners can analyze factors determining private education satisfaction (instructional quality, relationship-building, personalized services, etc.).
Learners can propose customized learning design plans reflecting learner characteristics.
Learners can develop satisfaction improvement plans utilizing feedback mechanisms and parental collaboration strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
